title: Pixel 3 XL shaking violently
content: I high number of times when I open the camera app on my Pixel 3 to take a photo or record video, the image sent to the display is distorted as if the camera was shaking violently. I requested 3 times support contact directly from device but Google ignores the problem. I would like to have my phone repaired or replaced under warranty, but I am in Brazil. They donÂ´t give us any return.
